utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey...

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Pheebs, what's wrong?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I'm just so exhausted from dragging around this... HUGE engagement ring!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: OH!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: My God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Congratulations! Wow!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, did he get on one knee, did he have a speech prepared, or did he cry? Yeah, big surprise, I like proposals!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, it was really sweet, and like the most romantic thing ever.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, hey! Well... Here's to Phoebe, who's found the greatest guy in the world! To Phoebe and... I wanna say Mike? To Phoebe and Mike!

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Whoo!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thank you! Oh, and I have something for you!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Mmh-mmh!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's, yes, my little black book. It's got the numbers of all the guys I've dated.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, Pheebs, baby, that's nice but, you know what, I think I'm ok. Why don't you give it to one of your other single girlfriends?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I would, but you're the last one.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: GIVE ME THE BOOK! Pablo Diaz, Brady Smith, huh, "Guy-in-van"?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, my first love!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What does the red X next to Bob Greenmore's name mean?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Dead. Oh, it's OK, no, he was old, yeah! And he lived a full life, he was in the first wave at Omaha Beach.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey, I'm sorry, I should have given you guys my black book when I got married! Although it wasn't so much a book as a... napkin. With Janice's phone number on it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe, isn't Jethro Tull a band?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yes, they are.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey honey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hi sweetie!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is Monica not here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, then I'll tell you. My agency was bidding for a big account and they got it! It's my first national commercial!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Cool!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, and I don't wanna brag but a lot of the ideas were mine! Hell, you weren't there? All the ideas were mine!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's great! Hey, can you cast me in it?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh... I don't know, I really don't think you're right for the part.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What do you mean? I can do anything, I'm a chameleon! Huh? I'm old! I'm tired! Hey, I'm hot I'm cold!! Huh?? Come on! What can't I do?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: First of all. Bravo. Uh, but I really don't think you're right for this. The part calls for a stuffy college professor.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can do that! "Hello, I'm your professor. When I'm not busy thinking of important things or... professing. I like to use..." Oh, what's the product?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Software that facilitates inter-business networking e-solutions?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm cold!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Guess who's a finalist for a huge research grant! I'll give you a hint, he's looking right at you.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Ah, well, unless it's the creepy guy with his hand up his kilt, I'm gonna say congratulations!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I'm so excited, I mean, apparently I beat out hundreds of other applicants, included five guys I went to graduate school with. Not that I'm keeping score or anything... five!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Wow, that's great! So, tell me about the grant!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, ok, it's for 25 thousand dollars. And if I get it, I'll finally be able to complete my field research! And there will be an article about me in the "Paleontology Review"! Yeah! That'll be the first time my name is in there, without people raising serious questions about my work!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Wait. Are you talking about the Dewar grant?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. Why?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Benjamin Hobart is administering that grant.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Your ex-boyfriend?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, your ex-boyfriend is gonna determine if your new boyfriend gets this grant? Wow, your new boyfriend is screwed!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: No, no, we ended up in great terms. I mean, if anything, I think this could help you. You know what? Why don't we all go out to dinner together, and I can introduce you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, if you think it would help.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Yes, absolutely. I'll call him.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ok, now, is there anything I can do to... you know, butter him up? Anything he really likes?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Mmh... he does have a pretty serious latex fetish.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We'll see how dinner goes.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, you wanna go to see a movie?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, I told you I had to spend all the day clearing out stuff, so Mike could move in.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, right.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, well. Now that I'm here I might as well help you with the cleaning and organizing! Just happen to have my label maker!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, it's so hard to get rid of stuff! Did you and Chandler have to make compromises when you first moved in together?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Uh, Chandler did! What does he want you to give up?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: A bunch of stuff. And the worst one... he wants me to get rid of Gladys.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Who's Gladys? Oh! What a tragic loss!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah. I really hate to give her up. Oh, I know!! Oh, you should take her!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I-I-I-I... I don't know...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why, you don't like her?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, of course I do. What's not to like! I'll take her in a minute! But, you know, I think that you're giving up too easy, honey. I think that you need to fight for her!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really? You think?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Absolutely! Yes, you say to him "I'm sorry Mike I can't live without her, she means too much to me!"

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok, I'll fight for her. Ok! Oh, wait, oh I just realized... if I do that, that means you don't get her.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Damn it, I did not think this through!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey you guys.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh! Any word on casting yet?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joe, I told you, you're just not right for the part.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What do you mean? Rach, don't I seem like a professor you'd buy some kind of e-crap from?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm sorry, this sounds like something I'm never gonna be interested in.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joe...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Just watch it, and if you don't like it, you don't pass it on to your bosses!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Fine!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thank you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Work, Joe!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Damn it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Just pass it to your boss!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He's not right for the part. So if I suggest him, my bosses are gonna think I'm an idiot! And that's something they should learn on their own!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Just tell Joey that you watched the tape and you liked it, but your bosses didn't. Then that way, you're the good guy and they're the bad guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That's good! I liked it, they didn't. Joey, for God's sake, go to work! .

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I can't believe I'm about to meet Benjamin Hobart. I've always thought of him as one of the people I'd invite to my fantasy dinner party. Do you think there's any chance he'll bring Christie Brinkley or C3PO?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Sorry, looks like it's just him.

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Charlie! My God, you look absolutely stunning!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I... I am having a good hair day.

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: So good to see you.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Me too.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm ok.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: I'm sorry... Ross Geller... Benjamin Hobart.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It's an honor to meet you. I can't tell you how long I've been an admirer of your work, I mean, that Nobel prize, whoooo! I mean, I have to tell you that, you're one of the reasons I got into the field.

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Oh, well, likewise. Actually, not likewise. I've never heard of you until this morning, but, it's nice to be nice!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Shall we? .

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Thank you! . I can't believe that you chose this restaurant! Do you remember the night?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Oh my God, I completely forgot! Oh my God! I can't believe they let us back in this place! .

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, but, it's, you know, it's just a funny image, you know, the two of you, in this restaurant, with... tzz-zzz, mmm.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Ross, why don't you tell Benji about your proposal, while I go to the ladies room?

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: So, tell me about it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ok well, I would like to do a dig in the painted desert.

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: M-m.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: See, there are still several areas that haven't been fully excavated.

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Break up with Charlie!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Did you just say "break up with Charlie"?

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Well, yes, and now. Yes I did say it, and no, I didn't not say it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Kind of inappropriate, don't you think?

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: I'm sorry. I just haven't seen her for so long! All these feelings are rushing back! I'm starting to realize how much I missed her, and I'm gonna need you to break up with her.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Are you serious?

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: If you say yes then I'm serious, if you say no then I'm joking!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Joking it is!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi! Sorry, I'm late.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, how did it go with Mike, is he gonna let you keep the painting?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, he really hates it. But he's gonna let me keep my box of human hair! So you got to pick your battles. But the good news is, Gladys is yours!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow, what's the bad news!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Who's Gladys?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, she's that work of art I made, you know, with the woman coming out of the frame.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, and Monica gets to keep her? In her house? I am so jealous!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I didn't know you wanted her too!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Huh!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I mean, sure, of course. But... you already gave that to Monica, so...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know, I would give her up, for you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I couldn't let you do that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But I want to.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But I don't want you to.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But I insist!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But I insist harder!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Girls, girls, stop, ok? We'll flip a coin. Heads, she's Rachel's, tails she's Monica's. . Tails! Monica, she's yours!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, that landed in your food!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, no, that's ok. You won fair and square. I'm so sad!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Joe!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What's up?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Bad news. I watched the tape and passed it along to my bosses and they weren't interested.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm sorry man.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But, ehm... you watched the tape?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah! I... I... I liked it! But, ehm... my bosses didn't go for it. Stupid sons of bitches!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You didn't watch the tape.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What!? Of course I did!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, it's one thing not to cast me, but to lie to me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm not lying to you, I watched it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, you lied again!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I watched it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Keep going Pinocchio!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I did!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No you didn't!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm telling you, I watched the tape.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Did you watch the tape?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: The selection committee has chosen the three of you as our finalists today. The ultimate decision will be based upon the answers you give to the questions I ask here. I'm gonna start with Dr. Li. Dr. Li, you claim the field is too reliant on the Linnaean taxonomic system. How do you propose to correct this problem?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Li
utterance.content: Well, I believe that the answers lie in the osteological evidence. I plan to begin there.

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Interesting.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I guess!

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Dr. Biely, your proposal includes some field work. Where might that take place?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Biely
utterance.content: Primarily in the Pierre Shale region of South Dakota.

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Certainly. Very well. And Dr. Geller, when is my birthday?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What? I... I...

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Care to venture a guess?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: May 12th?

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: That's not even kinda close! Dr. Li, how many graduate students you'd be needing?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Li
utterance.content: Half a dozen.

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: I see, and Dr. Biely?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Biely
utterance.content: Three for excavation and two for analysis.

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Certainly. Dr. Geller, which 1965 Shirelles hit was later covered by a popular British invasion band?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wha..? I need 6 graduate students.

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: No! I'm sorry, we were looking for "Baby It's You". Baby It's You.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wha...? Wait, wait, wait, just a minute. None of my questions have anything to do with Paleontology.

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: You're right, I apologize. Scratch the last question. Spell "Boscodictiasaur".

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: um... I've never heard of a "Boscodictiasaur".

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Yeah, I just made it up. Spell it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ok. B - O - S ...

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: No, it starts with a silent "M".

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh come on!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can't believe Joey. I hate being called a liar!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But you are a liar.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What did I just say?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You still here?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, and I have to say, I am not just hurt. I am insulted. When I tell somebody I did something...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ok whoah-hey... Let me just stop you right there, ok? First, you lied, right? Then, you lied about lying, ok? Then you lied about lying about lying, ok? So before you lie about lying about lying about lying about... lying... Stop lying!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why are you so sure I didn't watch this tape?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You wanna know wh...? You wanna know why?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, this is going well.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Here's how I know you didn't watch the tape, ok? If you had seen what was on this tape, believe me, you would have some comments. Alright, now remember, I got paid a lot of money for this and it only aired in Japan.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And that's how I know you didn't watch the tape! .

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: He really is a chameleon.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, Gladys say hello to your new home!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, my!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow! Oh, she's so nice and big! Oh, Monica, where are you going to display Gladys oh so proudly?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I haven't really settled on a spot yet!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, hey! How about right above the TV? . That way, it will be the first thing that you see when you walk in the door!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah! And you can get rid of that French poster.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I like that poster!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Really? It doesn't have anything coming out of it. Or maybe there is some place for her in your bedroom?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! There's nothing above your bed!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Are you still here?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh hi! Hello! Uh, have you come to ask me some more paleontology related questions? Uhm... your grandmother's nickname, perhaps? Aunt Margaret's pants size?

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: I've come here to apologize. I think I may have let my feelings for Charlie interfere with the interview process.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! Stop!

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Anyway, I've decided to offer you the grant.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Well... there is just one small... stipulation...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I have to break up with Charlie?

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Hey, you got one right!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're crazy.

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Crazy, or... romantic?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Crazy!

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Ooor...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Get out!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: O-oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, what... is... this...thing... doing here?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I got it from Monica. She sold it to me for a very reasonable price.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, we're not keeping this!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But it's an original Buffay...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Alright, fine. You can keep it. As long as you don't mind that she's haunted.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey? what? what? wey! whoo! what? what!?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, legend has it Joey, that... she comes alive when you're asleep.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She climbs out of the frame, and then drags her half-a-body across the floor, just looking for legs to steal. And then with her one good hand, she slo-o-owly re-e-a-aches up and turns your doorknob.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: GET THAT LEGLESS WITCH OUT OF HERE!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey! I sold that to Joey.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, why I told him it's haunted. Two can play at this game.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, too late. You can't give it back!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yes I can!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No you can't. She's yours!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She's yours!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: SHE'S YOURS!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She's yours!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She's mine!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She's m-i-i-ne!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She's mine!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She's mine!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You guys! You guys! You don't have to fight over her anymore. Whoever doesn't get Gladys gets Glynnis.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I want Gladys!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She's mine!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She's mine!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She's mine!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She's mine!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, I'm sorry I didn't give them your tape. And I promise, next time to submit you whether I think you are right for the part or not.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's not the point Chandler. The point is that you lied.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know. You're right. What's it gonna take for you to forgive me?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excellent!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Now, what do you say?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Lying is wrong!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And?... AND?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm a pretty little girl.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I knew it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Your ex-boyfriend is insane.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Did you get the grant?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No I didn't, and you want to know why? Because your ex-boyfriend is still in love with you.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah. He wouldn't give me the grant, because I wouldn't give you up.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Benji isn't in love with me. I mean, he broke up with me. And besides, he's a very ethical man.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really? Is it ethical to ask someone in a grant review, who was the voice of "Underdog"?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: I'm sure he was just joking, Ross.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: If you don't believe me, let's go talk to him, okay? I'm telling you, he didn't ask me one paleontological question.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Seriously?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I'm sorry, no. He did ask me one. Uhm... How do you spell Mboscodictiosaur?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Well, if it's like the lake Mbosco in Congo, then M-B-O...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Damnit!

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Dr. Geller...? Charlie... What are you... what are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I want you to tell her everything. About the deal you tried to make with me, about the crazy questions you... Wally Cox! That's the voice of Underdog!

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Like I tried to tell you in the interview Ross, this grant is not based on your knowledge of pretty useless trivia.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, no. Don't do that! I want you to look her in the eyes, and tell her the truth.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Benji?

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Alright, it's true. I behaved horribly. But it's only because I still love you. And I would do anything to have you back in my life.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Too little, too late, Benji!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: I can't believe this.

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: I never should have broken up with you. I think about you all the time. I mean, do you ever still think about me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Yes!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: I don't know what to say, Benji. This is all so.... romantic.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: or...

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: Listen, I know, I may be way out of bounds here, but is there any chance you will take me back?

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Maybe...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sweetie, this conversation is starting to make me a little uncomfortable.

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: Oh God! I am so sorry, but... I mean it's... there's so much history between us, you know...

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: I'm sorry too...

utterance.speaker: Benjamin
utterance.content: I love you!

utterance.speaker: Charlie
utterance.content: I love you too!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, that's it. WE ARE SEEING OTHER PEOPLE!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Gladys?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ha ha ha, third time this week. Man, this does not get old.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You're mean!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, don't be such a baby!
